chunks.zh: 付高额彩礼还是提出分手，唉
chunks.en: Pay a high bride price or propose to break up, sigh

chunks.zh:
和女友谈三四年了吧，我俩老家距离很远很远。

听对方妈妈说彩礼要三十万，这对于我来说，实在太多了。
chunks.en:
I've been dating my girlfriend for three or four years, and our hometowns are very, very far apart.

Her mother said that the bride price would be 300,000, which is too much for me.

chunks.zh:
女友的表态是努力拿 10w 回来。

要结婚的话，光彩礼就要三十万，杂七杂八加起来又得多少。
chunks.en:
My girlfriend said she would try to get 100,000 back.

If we get married, the bride price alone will be 300,000, and how much will it cost with all the other expenses?

chunks.zh:
我想了想，婚后的日子简直不用过了，肯定是一地鸡毛。

我既愤怒对方这一卖女儿式的高额彩礼，又悲哀这一段注定没有结果的恋爱。
chunks.en:
I thought about it, and the life after marriage would be impossible, it would definitely be a mess.

I am both angry at the other party's daughter-selling high bride price and sad about this doomed love affair.

chunks.zh: 我不晓得该如何做，目前我自己的心态就是和对方过一天算一天，继续好好挣钱，同时我也不舍得分手，毕竟相处很久了。
chunks.en: I don't know what to do. My current mentality is to live one day at a time with her, continue to work hard to make money, and at the same time I am reluctant to break up, after all, we have been together for a long time.

chunks.zh: 三十万是真敢要啊。兄弟你拿去玩勾八都能磨平了。
chunks.en: 300,000 is really a bold demand. Brother, if you take it to play, you can grind your dick smooth.

chunks.zh: 站起来蹬😡然后放生
chunks.en: Stand up and kick 😡 then release it

chunks.zh: 未来积蓄不是本身就在楼主这吗，为什么要转到女方那再算才算未来积蓄，说什么彩礼是未来小家庭的启动资金的都是龟男的自我安慰罢了，这个钱本来就在你这，在你这就不是启动资金，转给女方就是启动资金了？
chunks.en: Isn't the future savings already with the original poster? Why transfer it to the woman's side to be considered future savings? Saying that the bride price is the start-up capital for the future small family is just a self-comforting statement from a cuckold. This money is already with you. If it's with you, it's not start-up capital. If you transfer it to the woman, it's start-up capital?

chunks.zh: 要说什么启动资金那也得双方一人一半才算
chunks.en: If you want to talk about start-up capital, it should be half from each party.

chunks.zh: @shadowyue 是的，很多人没想过，这彩礼钱，能在中国日一圈了；放到东南亚能日好几圈
chunks.en: @shadowyue Yes, many people haven't thought about it. This bride price money can get you laid all over China; if you put it in Southeast Asia, you can get laid several times over.

chunks.zh: 30w 东南亚算 500 人民币每周一个 20 岁出头的高瘦白不间断能日 12 年，你自己算吧，这个钱都能把勾吧磨细了
chunks.en: 300,000 in Southeast Asia can get you a tall, thin, and pale 20-year-old for 500 yuan per week non-stop for 12 years. You do the math. This money can grind your dick thin.

chunks.zh: 把她搞怀孕，最后着急的是她家
chunks.en: Get her pregnant, and her family will be the ones who are worried in the end.

chunks.zh: 放弃要是这女生要 30w 还能解释，她妈妈要 30w 就让她去找个愿意掏 30w 的人来呗
chunks.en: Give up. If this girl wanted 300,000, it could be explained. If her mother wants 300,000, let her find someone who is willing to pay 300,000.

chunks.zh: 当了二三十年的独立女性了，到了要彩礼了开始听妈妈的话了。
chunks.en: She's been an independent woman for twenty or thirty years, and when it comes to the bride price, she starts listening to her mother.

chunks.zh: 那你也问题既然要了彩礼，生几个孩子的听我的还必须生男孩，以后照顾公婆，娘家的事以后我不管，你问她愿不愿意？
chunks.en: Then you also have a question. Since you want the bride price, will you listen to me about how many children to have and must have a boy, take care of my parents-in-law in the future, and I won't care about my family's affairs in the future. Ask her if she is willing.

chunks.zh: 女方表态努力拿 10w 回来 对你也不咋喜欢 纯粹的人口贩卖 但是又当不了奴隶 不分还等啥啊
chunks.en: The woman's statement that she will try to get 100,000 back shows that she doesn't really like you. It's pure human trafficking, but she can't be a slave. What are you waiting for if you don't break up?

chunks.zh: 江西的直接分，你以为给完彩礼就完了吗？
chunks.en: Break up directly if she's from Jiangxi. Do you think it's over after you give the bride price?

chunks.zh: 开始而已，后面是无穷无尽的帮扶，甚至是穷人补贴富人。
chunks.en: It's just the beginning. After that, there will be endless help, and even the poor subsidizing the rich.

chunks.zh: 包邮区给 30 万彩礼，起码能拿回来 40 万。
chunks.en: If you give 300,000 as a bride price in the shipping zone, you can at least get 400,000 back.

chunks.zh: 我前女友四川某地级市的，我在四川另外一个市，也不远开车 2 个小时不到，耍了几年，用了一些钱，谈婚论嫁她妈张口 20w 彩礼不返还，直接分手不犹豫。
chunks.en: My ex-girlfriend was from a certain prefecture-level city in Sichuan, and I was in another city in Sichuan, not far away, less than 2 hours by car. We dated for a few years, spent some money, and when we talked about marriage, her mother asked for a 200,000 bride price that would not be returned. I broke up directly without hesitation.

chunks.zh: 她独生女，就是卖女儿。
chunks.en: She's an only child, she's just selling her daughter.

chunks.zh: 你只要答应了，后面还有其他等着呢。
chunks.en: As long as you agree, there are other things waiting for you later.

chunks.zh: 后面分开后一年，又联系我，说不要彩礼，问能不能她城市买房结婚，想屁吃，突然降价了更不能要了，这不是让我接盘嘛。
chunks.en: A year after we broke up, she contacted me again, saying she didn't want the bride price and asked if we could buy a house in her city and get married. Dream on. If she suddenly lowered the price, I couldn't accept it even more. Isn't this asking me to take over?

chunks.zh: 现在老婆相亲认识的，就接触了 6 个月就扯证结婚了，4 万彩礼，结婚几年后就返还了。
chunks.en: Now my wife was introduced to me through a matchmaking arrangement. We got married after only 6 months of dating. The bride price was 40,000, and it was returned a few years after marriage.

chunks.zh: 还可以吧，生活也没有大手大脚，生个女儿很幸福。
chunks.en: It's okay, right? We don't spend money extravagantly, and we are very happy to have a daughter.

chunks.zh: 兄弟，婚后生活都是柴米油盐酱醋茶，你们差距这么远，一些习惯差距后续你慢慢发现应该也会很大。
chunks.en: Brother, married life is all about daily necessities, and the gap between you is so big. You will slowly discover that some habit gaps will be very big later.

chunks.zh: 找个近点的吧，文化习惯都差不多的，和谁不是过一辈子呢，再喜欢后面也有可能分
chunks.en: Find someone who is closer, with similar cultural habits. Who are you not spending your life with? You may break up even if you like them later.

chunks.zh: 『努力拿 10w 回来』 ，不知道该怎么形容
chunks.en: 'Trying to get 100,000 back', I don't know how to describe it.

chunks.zh: @shadowyue 话糙理不糙，但你这也太糙了吧🤣
chunks.en: @shadowyue The words are rough but the principle is correct, but yours is too rough 🤣

chunks.zh: 30w 能包养好几个，注意是包养，这个必须要强调一下，因为体验和散装的不一样。
chunks.en: 300,000 can support several mistresses. Note that it is supporting, this must be emphasized because the experience is different from casual encounters.

chunks.zh: 30w 可以让你嫖到不想日 p ，这又是舔狗一个暴击伤害，😂😂😂
chunks.en: 300,000 can get you laid until you don't want to fuck anymore. This is another critical hit for simps, 😂😂😂

chunks.zh: 我娶的江西的都能改变他们一家。全包 16w 。包括女方家的酒席和五金。爱不爱你，自己心里有数的
chunks.en: I married someone from Jiangxi and was able to change their family. All-inclusive 160,000. Including the woman's family's banquet and the five gold items. Whether she loves you or not, you know it in your heart.

chunks.zh: 妈妈要 30w 也就是唱红白脸，真喜欢你一毛都不要
chunks.en: The mother asking for 300,000 is just playing good cop/bad cop. If she really likes you, she won't want a penny.

chunks.zh: @sagaxu 看到最后笑死了，和我朋友一模一样，彩礼 18.8w ，带回来 40w 。两个都是江苏的，南京和常州。
chunks.en: @sagaxu I laughed to death at the end. It's exactly the same as my friend. The bride price was 188,000, and they brought back 400,000. Both are from Jiangsu, Nanjing and Changzhou.

chunks.zh: 这是北京的，你们轻点喷，哈哈哈哈哈哈
chunks.en: This is Beijing, please be gentle, hahahahaha

chunks.zh: 说了几百遍了，这年头彩礼不给小两口的，全部拉黑，几十万投资在自己身上，他妈叼都能磨平了
chunks.en: I've said it hundreds of times, these days, if the bride price isn't given to the young couple, block them all. Invest hundreds of thousands on yourself, you can grind your dick smooth.
